snippet: Jodi Arias was found guilty of first-degree murder for the killing of her onetime boyfriend, Travis Alexander, in a trial marked by months of salacious evidence and testimony.
abstract: Jodi Arias is found guilty of first-degree murder for killing onetime boyfriend Travis Alexander.
lead_paragraph: Jodi Arias was found guilty of first-degree murder for the killing of her onetime boyfriend, Travis Alexander, in a trial marked by months of salacious evidence and testimony.
